mapper.select: select xau.*, xar.id as resource_id, xar.name as resource_name, xar.resource, xar.resource_type, xar.parent_id as resource_parent_id, xar.code as resource_code from x_authorization_user xau left join x_authorization_user_role xaur on xau.id = xaur.user_id left join x_authorization_role_resource xarr on xaur.role_id = xarr.role_id left join x_authorization_resource xar on xarr.resource_id = xar.id where xau.name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
